me.joeycumines.javapromises.v1

Class PromiseRunnableFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.joeycumines.javapromises.core.PromiseApi
      • me.joeycumines.javapromises.v1.PromiseRunnableFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PromiseFactory

    public class PromiseRunnableFactory
extends PromiseApi
implements PromiseFactory
    A factory for creating PromiseRunnable instances.

    Default promise runner (for the global instance) is SimpleRunner.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PromiseRunnableFactory(PromiseRunner runner)

      static PromiseRunnableFactory getInstance() 
      PromiseRunnable reject(java.lang.Throwable value)
      Create a new REJECTED promise.
      PromiseRunnable resolve(java.lang.Object value)
      Create a new promise that will fulfill or reject, if given a promise and based on it's state, otherwise simply fulfilling with the value given.

      • resolve

        public PromiseRunnable resolve(java.lang.Object value)
                        throws CircularResolutionException
        Description copied from interface: PromiseFactory
        Create a new promise that will fulfill or reject, if given a promise and based on it's state, otherwise simply fulfilling with the value given. Note that this method is RECURSIVE, like the A+ Promise spec.
        Specified by:
        resolve in interface PromiseFactory
        Parameters:
        value - The value this will finalized, promises will have their state propagated.
        Returns:
        A new promise.
        Throws:
        CircularResolutionException - If there are circular references of FULFILLED promises.

      • getInstance

        public static PromiseRunnableFactory getInstance()
        Returns:
        A global PromiseRunnableFactory (thread safe).
